intro: Harlanlewisia, commonly known as the Harlan's hawksbeard, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in arid and rocky environments, showcasing adaptations to harsh conditions. Harlanlewisia has narrow, grayish-green leaves and produces yellow-orange flowers that bloom in late spring. It is a rare and protected species, often found in specific habitats within New Mexico and Arizona.
